text: Men are strong so long as they represent a strong idea they become powerless when they oppose it.
author: Sigmund Freud

text: All men are not created equal but should be treated as though they were under the law.
author: Andy Rooney

text: Happy is he who still loves something he loved in the nursery: He has not been broken in two by time he is not two men, but one, and he has saved not only his soul but his life.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

text: Aristotle could have avoided the mistake of thinking that women have fewer teeth than men, by the simple device of asking Mrs. Aristotle to keep her mouth open while he counted.
author: Bertrand Russell

text: The history of free men is never really written by chance but by choice their choice!
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower
